html:
11.22.19  3:58 am   does art need an explanation?

      no but you can explain it anyway

11.22.19  3:40 am   when will you post a video on youtube?

      i'm having a countdown timer

11.22.19  2:48 am   when do you usually answer questions? 

      any time. Friday, November 22, 2019 10:33:44 AM for example

11.22.19  2:17 am   how do you tell when you're done making a song?

      as soon as it's at least 1 hour long, then it's probably done

11.22.19  2:12 am   when will you come back to youtube?

      i'm having a countdown timer

11.22.19  2:04 am   damien, why is everything so dumb and stupid

      ah, that is due to intelligence. please don't call me damien

11.22.19  1:15 am   so you probably have a lot going on, but would you ever consider thinking of maybe doing a tour? 

      yes

11.22.19  1:12 am   About how long does it usually take you on average to answer a question after it is received? How many seconds/minutes/hours would the person have to normally wait for their question to be answered? Genuinely curious how fast you answer these types of things.

      i'm trying to do it twice a day now

11.22.19  12:35 am   Bill, when will you be back, we need you

      i'm having a countdown timer

11.22.19  12:31 am   how does it feel being so popular?

      interesting but there's demons

11.22.19  12:20 am   do we exist

      who? nevermind, yes

11.22.19  12:10 am   Opinion on Traffic Cones?

      it seems like they should have better weight distribution. nevermind, they are perfect in every way

11.21.19  11:58 pm   can you tell me whether virtue can be tought, or is present by nature, or by some other way?

      which virtue

11.21.19  11:45 pm   How do you come up with music?

     it has to come up with itself but you can coax it into existence by poking it with a stick

      Like the chord progressions and stuff.

     the chords, melody, lyrics, and entire context must arrive together otherwise they don't seem to work properly

11.21.19  11:29 pm   Will technology be so crazy in 100 years that all human creativity will be useless?

      no

11.21.19  11:16 pm   Ok. Serious question. Should pie be considered a form of cake? 

      no

11.21.19  10:38 pm   what does it take to get yourself ready to handle every moment

      you're gonna want to spend some time in a moment factory

11.21.19  10:35 pm   aw man why'd i have to be born so weird

      perhaps you are the chosen one

11.21.19  10:31 pm   Hello Bill! I was wondering, whats your favorute invention,

     language

      and why its your favorite

      drastically accelerates the advancement of technology

11.21.19  10:27 pm   What is your theme song?

      maybe this

11.21.19  10:26 pm   Is a sense of humor a byproduct of consciousness

     that sounds about right

      or something else entirely?

11.21.19  10:13 pm   do you like it when your piano is on the ceiling or when it is floating between time and space?

      it's nice when it's on the wall

11.21.19  10:02 pm   BY READING THIS QUESTION YOU HAVE ALREADY CONSENTED TO BEING A DONKEY FOREVER, AGAIN.

      oh dang i always fall for that one

11.21.19  9:52 pm   give me a number between 4 and 4.1

      4.05

11.21.19  9:43 pm   Wait, did you say that you are in Florida right now?

      yes but i am about to leave

11.21.19  9:42 pm   Love your work! Can you make a song about questions?

      sure

11.21.19  9:35 pm   Hey, how is your pet washing machine?

      pretty good

11.21.19  9:16 pm   do you ever eat a hotdog then stop because you're eating a hotdog

      once you start it's usually too late

11.21.19  9:06 pm   Why are there so many starfish?

      probably because an angel saved them

11.21.19  8:54 pm   what did you do on the plane or train ride over to where you are now?

      anagrams

11.21.19  8:49 pm   do u realise i am

      yes

11.21.19  8:28 pm   How many ants in a pound of ants

      several dozen i reckon

11.21.19  8:07 pm   what do bagels sound like?

      absolutely nothing. bagels are completely silent

11.21.19  8:02 pm   How do you find inspiration?

      i have a bucket to catch the inspiration but sometimes the bucket itself inspires me

11.21.19  8:00 pm   do you like answering good questions

      yes, and bad questions also

11.21.19  7:59 pm   How long have you been doing music?

      for as long as i can possibly remember

11.21.19  7:53 pm   Bill can you be my fiend?

      i will try

11.21.19  6:48 pm   how is the new computer setup thingy for multimedia content creation

      very good if i can get smart enough

11.21.19  6:44 pm   i find it interesting that you record your voice to get you to do stuff and work out what you are doing , huge fan of your reality page, i attempted to do the same but i find it cringey to go back to those recordings, how do you feel when you open those recordings and edit them?

      totally fine. i've done it so much i got used to that long long ago

11.21.19  6:33 pm   do you ever feel like scribbles

      yes

11.21.19  5:34 pm   What do I do when I get called a zombie?

      throw an absolute tantrum, zombie style

11.21.19  5:27 pm   Why is a question a question?

      because you said so

11.21.19  5:18 pm   11.20.19  8:18 pm   what i have so far is a repeating 5/4 bar, in G minor, with the notes D (1 beat) G (2 beats) Eb D (both 1/2 beat) C (1 beat)

      without knowing the tempo, i will give you some suggestions. in the 1 bar only category, i'll suggest
G- _ _ C- _
or
G- _ _ D7 _
or
G- _ _ C- D7
but if we're allowed to have 2 bars of chords, there are many more options
G- _ _ _ _
C- _ _ D7 _
or
G- _ _ (F) _
Ebma7 _ _ F _
or
G- _ _ _ _
Ebma7 _ _ D7 _
there are some even better options if you look at 4 bars, but if you do that you're gonna want to change the melody at the end and i would love to tell you what i think would happen but then i would be writing the song for you. and even if i were writing it for myself, this gets to the point where i have to start considering lyrics because at a certain point melodies stop caring about themselves unless they have a bit of contextual substance

11.21.19  5:10 pm   Give me the best singing tip you have.

      improvising the lyrics usually makes the singing better

11.21.19  4:13 pm   What's the most words you can say in a minute?

      i'm not sure

11.21.19  4:04 pm   i think its really cool how you have answers for most generic questions

      i actually don't, but doing this page forces me to come up with something anyway

11.21.19  3:58 pm   did you go to college?

      no

11.21.19  3:51 pm   how much time do you take to make a video

      anywhere between 4 seconds and 4 years

11.21.19  3:50 pm   why do we exist

      could be fun and/or challenging

11.21.19  3:48 pm   How many questions have you been asked on here?

     probably about a quarter million, but it's difficult to get an entirely accurate calculation

      Do you enjoy answering them?

     it makes me stronger
